strapiPost.title: Game On At Fayetteville's Final First Thursday Of The Year
strapiPost.content:
Come enjoy the free, community event filled with music, food, art, and fun at the last of Fayetteville’s 2022 First Thursday series. 

  • Ain't no strings on me: Some of the unique elements of this month’s Larger Than Life theme will include free yoga, an enormous puppet parade, and a Slow Roll Glow Ride. 
  • Game on: Gaming on the square will be presented by this month’s sponsor: ReWired Fest, a two day esports tournaments coming to Fayetteville on Oct 21-22.

See a full line up this week's First Thursday HERE.
